original_text: Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth, for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away, and the sea was no more.
korean_text: 또 내가 새 하늘과 새 땅을 보니 처음 하늘과 처음 땅이 없어졌고 바다도 다시 있지 않더라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 새 하늘과 새 땅을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 첫째 하늘과 첫째 땅이 사라졌기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and the sea was no more
